QuestData.Title: Tell No One!
QuestData.Description: Perfect!$b$bThis will show the elves what the Horde is capable of when we're backed into a corner.$b$bListen, $n. You must say nothing of this to anyone!$b$bSaurfang will surely approve once he sees the results, but if we are found out beforehand, our heads will be placed on spikes!$b$b<Draaka hands you a hastily written note.>$b$bBring this to Durak. You can find him in the mines behind me, just to the north. He will instruct you further.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Whatever you do, don't read that note.
QuestData.LogDescription: Draaka in Splintertree wants you to bring the Hastily Written Note to Durak.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the Hastily Written Note to Durak in Splintertree Post.
QuestData.RewardText: What's this? Who are you!?$b$b<Durak reads Draaka's note.>$b$bHrmphh...$b$bDraaka should know better than to be so brazen, but it looks like you're up to your eyes in this with as much to lose as anyone.$b$bVery well.
